headline: CoreWeave-Core Scientific deal pushes AI merger tally over $65 billion as M&A market thaws
summary: As the market enters the second half of the year, AI is primed to remain the darling of dealmaking for 2025.

headline: Merger-Arbitrage Investors With Billions to Wager Await Next Wave of Mega-Deals
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Merger arbitrage investors are finally enjoying gains again after their trading strategy resulted in some first-half windfalls. Now, with fresh billions to wager, all they need is a new wave of dealmaking. headline: Datadog (DDOG) Joins S&P 500 — TD Cowen Reiterates Buy Rating
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the Top 10 AI Stocks in the Spotlight. On July 3, TD Cowen analyst Andrew Sherman reiterated a “Buy” rating on the stock with a $150.00 price target. The rating affirmation follows Datadog’s inclusion in the S&P 500. The cloud monitoring company will be replacing Juniper Networks, which has been acquired […]

headline: Here’s why you should avoid owning SMCI stock: BofA
summary: Investing.com -- Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ:SMCI) is facing mounting headwinds in the AI server space, according to Bank of America Securities, which resumed coverage of the stock with an Underperform rating and a $35 price objective, implying roughly 29% downside from current levels.

headline: This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Is Surging After Joining the S&P 500. Can It Continue to Skyrocket?
summary: Datadog stock has gone parabolic in the past three months, and it recently shot up following the news of its inclusion in the S&P 500 index.  Datadog's lucrative addressable opportunity suggests that it may be able to justify its valuation in the long run.  Shares of Datadog (NASDAQ: DDOG) shot up nearly 15% on July 3 after it was revealed that the provider of cloud-based observability, monitoring, and security solutions will join the S&P 500 index on July 9.
